verses.plain: Lord, thou hast been our dwelling place in all generations.

tokens.t: Lord, thou hast been our dwelling place in all generations.

verses.plain: Before the mountains were brought forth, or ever thou hadst formed the earth and the world, even from everlasting to everlasting, thou art God.

tokens.t: Before the mountains were brought forth, or ever thou hadst formed the earth and the world, even from everlasting to everlasting, thou
God.

verses.plain: Thou turnest man to destruction; and sayest, Return, ye children of men.

tokens.t: Thou turnest man to destruction; and sayest, Return, ye children of men.

verses.plain: For a thousand years in thy sight are but as yesterday when it is past, and as a watch in the night.

tokens.t: For a thousand years in thy sight
as yesterday when it is past, and
a watch in the night.

verses.plain: Thou carriest them away as with a flood; they are as a sleep: in the morning they are like grass which groweth up.

tokens.t: Thou carriest them away as with a flood; they are
a sleep: in the morning
like grass
groweth up.

verses.plain: In the morning it flourisheth, and groweth up; in the evening it is cut down, and withereth.

tokens.t: In the morning it flourisheth, and groweth up; in the evening it is cut down, and withereth.

verses.plain: For we are consumed by thine anger, and by thy wrath are we troubled.

tokens.t: For we are consumed by thine anger, and by thy wrath are we troubled.

verses.plain: Thou hast set our iniquities before thee, our secret sins in the light of thy countenance.

tokens.t: Thou hast set our iniquities before thee, our secret
in the light of thy countenance.

verses.plain: For all our days are passed away in thy wrath: we spend our years as a tale that is told.

tokens.t: For all our days are passed away in thy wrath: we spend our years as a tale

verses.plain: The days of our years are threescore years and ten; and if by reason of strength they be fourscore years, yet is their strength labour and sorrow; for it is soon cut off, and we fly away.

tokens.t: The days of our years
threescore years and ten; and if by reason of strength
fourscore years, yet
their strength labour and sorrow; for it is soon cut off, and we fly away.

verses.plain: Who knoweth the power of thine anger? even according to thy fear, so is thy wrath.

tokens.t: Who knoweth the power of thine anger? even according to thy fear,
thy wrath.

verses.plain: So teach us to number our days, that we may apply our hearts unto wisdom.

tokens.t: So teach
to number our days, that we may apply
hearts unto wisdom.

verses.plain: Return, O LORD, how long? and let it repent thee concerning thy servants.

tokens.t: Return, O
, how long? and let it repent thee concerning thy servants.

verses.plain: O satisfy us early with thy mercy; that we may rejoice and be glad all our days.

tokens.t: O satisfy us early with thy mercy; that we may rejoice and be glad all our days.

verses.plain: Make us glad according to the days wherein thou hast afflicted us, and the years wherein we have seen evil.

tokens.t: Make us glad according to the days
thou hast afflicted us,
the years
we have seen evil.

verses.plain: Let thy work appear unto thy servants, and thy glory unto their children.

tokens.t: Let thy work appear unto thy servants, and thy glory unto their children.

verses.plain: And let the beauty of the LORD our God be upon us: and establish thou the work of our hands upon us; yea, the work of our hands establish thou it.

tokens.t: And let the beauty of the
our God be upon us: and establish thou the work of our hands upon us; yea, the work of our hands establish thou it.

footnotes.text: A Prayer…: or, A Prayer, being a Psalm of Moses
in…: Heb. in generation and generation
when…: or, when he hath passed them
as a…: or, as a meditation
The days…: Heb. As for the days of our years, in them are seventy years
